summary: Retextures for the 5 types of Spell Tomes, giving them unique & appropriate colors for each school of magic as well as hi-res textures & normal maps.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/33563-3-1365283267.png[/img][/center]
[center]

[size=3]Retextures for the vanilla Spell Tomes that gives them their[/size] "[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]c[/color][color=#00ff00]o[/color][color=#3366ff]l[/color][color=#ffff00]o[/color][color=#ff6600]r[/color][/b] [color=#ff00ff]coded[/color][/size]"[size=3] respective book cover.[/size]

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3741/8829408796_9e4c296ff8_c_d.jpg[/img]

[/center][size=3][b]Installing:[/b][/size]
Choose a replacer from a directory and copy the "Data\" folder provided in the archive to your
Skyrim\Data directory.

Overwrite any other files when prompted.

[size=3][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]
Trace back to the contents of the archive and delete what you have previously added to your Skyrim\Data directory.
author: jeclxohko
